course_description: The course provides an introduction to visual anthropology. It has two foci: the anthropological study of visual practices (painting, art markets, photography, the museum); and anthropological work pursued through film and photography.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3988, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: A. Graham, Status: Wait List
